body:
Hi Jan,


Thanks for the reply. I couldn't find this email and reply back to the
group to update everyone.


The issue turned out to be exporting an empty sensor file. I assumed that
Daysim doesn't need sensor information and will only look for .vf file if I
want to only run an annual glare analysis but then I checked the source
code and I saw that gen_dgp_profile looks for sensor file in two different
functions.


I'm not still clear how gen_dgp_profile uses sensor points for annual glare
analysis but adding the sensor files solved the issue. I really appreciate
it if you can shed some light about the relationship between sensor files
and annual glare analysis.


Best,
Mostapha
___
